Sergei Rachmaninoff

Hopak from Sorotchinsky Fair (Modest Mussorgsky)

1924 · Threlfall and Norris III/8

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of the hopak from Modest Mussorgsky’s uncompleted opera Sorotchinsky Fair. Mussorgsky also made his own arrangement, whilst Rachmaninoff made a further arrangement for violin and piano in 1925.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5
